definition: to scrape/to blow/to shave/to plunder/to extort
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: I'll send up a toothbrush right away.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支牙刷和一支刮鬍刀。

sentences.english: John shaved off his beard with an electric razor.
sentences.chinese: 約翰以電動刮鬍刀颳去鬍子。

sentences.english: I'd like a toothbrush and a razor.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支牙刷和一支刮鬍刀。

sentences.english: NO15, Have you been using my razor? It's dull.
sentences.chinese: 你有用我的刮鬍刀嗎？刀片鈍了。

sentences.english: The man would probably seize him by the wrist and take the razor away.
sentences.chinese: 那人很可能會抓住他的手腕，把刮鬍刀奪走。

sentences.english: A razor should have a very sharp blade.
sentences.chinese: 刮鬍刀應有銳利的刀鋒。

sentences.english: Without an adapter, I can't use my shaver or dryer.
sentences.chinese: 沒有轉接器我就不能用我的刮鬍刀或吹風機了。

sentences.english: When graduating, I gave my teacher an electric razor as a present.
sentences.chinese: 畢業的時候，我送老師一把電動刮鬍刀。

sentences.english: Do you like my new razor kit?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡我的新刮鬍刀嗎？

sentences.english: He shaved his beard with a new razor.
sentences.chinese: 他用新的刮鬍刀將臉上的鬍鬚刮乾淨。

sentences.english: I cut myself on the cheek with my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心被刮鬍刀割傷了臉頰。

sentences.english: Thee shaver can be charged up and used while traveling.
sentences.chinese: 這種刮鬍刀能在旅行的時候充電並使用。

sentences.english: Gold orchid steal out ZhiXiong razors and toothbrush, please do personally authorized.
sentences.chinese: 金蘭偷出智雄的刮鬍刀和牙刷，拜託做親身審定。

definition: machine parts or tools kept in reserve/spare parts
